Title: Modifies the composition of the voting majority upon the appointment and removal of the executive director of the joint commission on public ethics
Summary: Modifies the composition of the voting majority upon the appointment and removal of the executive director of the joint commission on public ethics; provides for the appointment and removal of the executive director by a vote of a majority of the commission, regardless of political appointment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to modifying the composition of the voting majority upon the appointment and removal of the executive director of the joint commission on public ethics
